content.question: Which of the following is the independent variable in the study?

choices.label: The type of soil used in the pallets
The type of pavers used in the pallets
The infiltration rate of the water
The temperature of the room that the pallets were left in

content.answer: The type of pavers used in the pallets

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
